name: Make. Eat. Count
description:
Created for the UE4 Summer Jam 2019 - Theme: Make It Count

You've invited some fussy friends to a BBQ and they are all counting calories! Do your best to serve them their main and sides as close to their calorie count as possible.

Controls:

LMB - Click on objects around the screen to focus and interact.

Credits:

Gameplay, Art, Programming: Joel Hodges

Third Party Content:

Music: Jahzzar, Rhyan Andersen, Eddy - Free Music Archive

Icons: Payungkead - Flaticon

Animations: Mixamo
